findings.title: Stale marketplace path in github-sync-handler.sh
findings.issue: Dead fallback path referencing removed ~/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/specweave directory. Harmless - skipped silently in search array.
findings.suggestion: Clean up in future increment. Out of scope for 0394.

findings.title: Stale comment referencing --plugin-dir
findings.issue: Comment said '--plugin-dir flags' but function now uses --repo.

findings.title: Code duplication between install functions
findings.issue: install_plugin_via_vskill() and install_vskill_repo_plugin() are nearly identical, differing only in --repo value.
findings.suggestion: Acceptable for shell script clarity. Two clear named functions better than one parameterized function.
